Language serves as a bridge to foster mutual understanding among people of different nations and to promote exchanges and mutual learning among diverse civilizations. On April 21, College of International Education will host a cultural experience event titled "Language Connects the World, Culture Enriches the Globe" to celebrate and promote International Chinese Language Day. Through language-based challenge games and cultural activities, the event aims to provide participants with an immersive experience of the charm of the Chinese language and traditional culture, while fostering cultural exchanges between China and other countries.
